addVertical(ReportItem, PageCount, ReportItem, ReportItem) - Method in class org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.Report
An enhancement over addVerticalIfPageFits() that lumps a variety of page-management features into a single method: If item fits within the remaining space on the page (including the space needed for footer) it is added via addVertical(ReportItem); if not, the following takes place:
addVerticalCenter(ReportItem...) - Method in class org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.PGroup
Works the same as addVertical(items), but also horizontally centers each item within this PGroup using item.setLeft().
addVerticalIfPageFits(ReportItem, float) - Method in class org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.Report
Enhances PGroup.addVertical(ReportItem...) such that item is only added if it fits on the page vertically below the last ReportItem added, and with enough space left over for footerHeight.
addVerticalIfPageFits(ReportItem) - Method in class org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.Report
A shortcut to addVerticalIfPageFits(item, 0)
addVerticalRight(ReportItem...) - Method in class org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.PGroup
Works the same as addVertical(items), but additionally right-justifies each item to the right side of this PGroup using item.setLeft().

A shortcut to moveX(xDistance).moveY(yDistance).
moveX(float) - Method in class org.tmotte.pdfrpt.SimplePDF
Moves the internal X coordinate; positive values of distance will move to the right, negatives values to the left.
moveY(float) - Method in class org.tmotte.pdfrpt.SimplePDF
Moves the internal Y coordinate; positive values of distance will move down, negatives values move up.

O

org.tmotte.pdfrpt - package org.tmotte.pdfrpt
Contains the core classes for PDF reporting.
org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report - package org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report
Improves on the SimplePDF class with object-oriented grouping of report elements, and relative positioning.
org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.item - package org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.item
Enhances the report package with classes for text, line art and image rendering.
org.tmotte.pdfrpt.test - package org.tmotte.pdfrpt.test
Contains a variety of unit tests, which are also useful as sample/tutorial code; the files in org.tmotte.pdfrpt.test.report are best suited for the latter.
org.tmotte.pdfrpt.test.report - package org.tmotte.pdfrpt.test.report
 
org.tmotte.pdfrpt.test.simplepdf - package org.tmotte.pdfrpt.test.simplepdf

R

REPLACE_CURR_PAGE - Static variable in class org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.item.AbstractText
Embed this String in the text of a PText or PTextLines instance and it will be replaced with the current page number.
REPLACE_PAGE_COUNT - Static variable in class org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.item.AbstractText
Embed this String in the text of a PText or PTextLines instance and it will be replaced with the total page count for the report.
Report - Class in org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report
The centerpiece of this package. ReportItems are added to a Report, and then the Report is printed.
Report(float, float) - Constructor for class org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.Report
Creates a new Report that uses the specified width and height for its pages.
Report(PageInfo) - Constructor for class org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.Report
Shortcut to Report(pageInfo.getWidth(), pageInfo.getHeight()); here, Report will attempt to respect the margins set on pageInfo and provide positional information based on the space bounded by those margins, not the boundaries of the page itself.
Report(SimplePDF) - Constructor for class org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.Report

SimplePDF - Class in org.tmotte.pdfrpt
A simple wrapper for the iText PDF library, for use by itself or with the org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report package (in either case with iText, of course).
